text.0:
"Deceptive messages are not finding their way to Americans via the now well-trodden paths of Facebook and Twitter. Instead, they’re arriving in waves of text messages and emails, making use of a more intimate and less scrutinised vector of disinformation"
https://t.co/fntx6Sdh0t
text.1: Journalists, human rights defenders, health officials,  #election watchdogs et al: in this new global @unesco @UNBBCom study we make 83 recommendations for countering #disinformation, including many dealing with political disinfo, elections & the platforms https://t.co/ddepbMXlmp https://t.co/PTxWwCKZb9
